title: Guys look what what I found. You think if I register they'll accept? Im from IIT bangalore

comments.body:
PES is IIT Bangalore. Get educated, kid.

/s just in case
Damn yeah I'm sure Esha will be impressed with your academic history (don't forget to show cgpa on first date)

Fun fact: a male alumnus from PESU can't register for IITIIM matrimony. But a female PESU alumnus is eligible to create a profile.

Atleast that was the case last time I checked.
